trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a property across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Define um contrato que componentes podem usar para acessar informações sobre uma propriedade nos limites de domínio e o processo do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: An IRemotePropertyInfoContract represents a property of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Um IRemotePropertyInfoContract representa uma propriedade de um objeto remoto que implementa o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>interface.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>

trans-unit.source: To access one or more properties of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar uma ou mais propriedades de um objeto remoto, use o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>método para obter um <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>que representa o tipo do objeto remoto.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperty%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, chame o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperty%2A>ou <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperties%2A>método.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperties%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperty%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""></xref> accessor of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""> </xref> acessador da propriedade que esse <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""></xref> accessor of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property does not have a <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""></xref> accessor.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> que representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""> </xref> acessador da propriedade que esse <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> </xref> identifica; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a propriedade não tem um <xref uid="langword_csharp_get" name="get" href=""> </xref> acessador.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre a propriedade que esse <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData> structure includes the type of the property value and whether the property is readable or writable.
trans-unit.target: As informações fornecidas pelo <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData>estrutura inclui o tipo de valor da propriedade e se a propriedade é de leitura ou de gravação.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"></xref> that provides information about the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData"> </xref> que fornece informações sobre a propriedade que esse <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> accessor of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""> </xref> acessador da propriedade que esse <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> accessor of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property does not have a <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> accessor.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> que representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""> </xref> acessador da propriedade que esse <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> </xref> identifica; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a propriedade não tem um <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""> </xref> acessador.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor da propriedade que esse <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that GetValue implementations throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the property is write-only.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável que geram de implementações GetValue um <xref:System.ArgumentException>se a propriedade é somente gravação.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"> </xref> que identifica o objeto que contém a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to invoke the property.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"> </xref> valores que especifica como invocar a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that specifies the index values for an indexed property; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property is not indexed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"> </xref> que especifica os valores de índice para uma propriedade indexada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a propriedade não está indexada.

trans-unit.source: A locale ID to use for locale-specific conversions that are performed by the property.
trans-unit.target: Uma ID de localidade a ser usada para conversões específicas de localidade que são executadas pela propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the property value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> </xref> que especifica o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the property that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da propriedade que isso <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that SetValue implementations throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável que geram de implementações SetValue um <xref:System.ArgumentException>se a propriedade é somente leitura.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"> </xref> que identifica o objeto que contém a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the property value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> </xref> que especifica o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to invoke the property.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"> </xref> valores que especifica como invocar a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that specifies the index values for an indexed property; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the property is not indexed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"> </xref> que especifica os valores de índice para uma propriedade indexada; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a propriedade não está indexada.

trans-unit.source: The locale ID that the property will use for any locale-specific type conversions.
trans-unit.target: A ID de localidade que a propriedade será usado para qualquer conversões de tipo específico de localidade.
